data.name: Society Cheque Account
data.description: The BankSA Society Cheque Account is a transaction account for not-for-profit organisations to deposit or withdraw funds by various channels.

features.additionalInfo: Easy access : Easy access at any BankSA branch, Bank@Post, 24/7 with Internet and Phone Banking, optional chequebook, express deposit, automatic payments and deposits and BPAY. Regular account statements
Free unlimited access to Internet and Phone Banking
With PayTo, you can see, review and authorise all new PayTo payments for things such as recurring bills, memberships and subscriptions before the money leaves your account.
Deposit Only card : For approved office bearers
Make non-cash payments via services such as BPAY, Pay Anyone, OSKO, Overseas Telegraphic Transfer (OTT) and Direct Debit.
Link an optional cheque book to your account
Statements: At least every six months
Deposit, receive and access funds, and make payments through a variety of channels including in branch, online and telephone banking

features.additionalValue: SMS and email alerts are available

features.additionalInfo: The product includes limited range of FRAUD_PROTECTION features.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Operating in Australia with an Australian address
Not-for-profit organisations including charities, community and sporting groups, schools, government bodies, and registered political parties

fees.name: Internet Banking
fees.additionalInfo: A transfer between your BankSA accounts, a transfer from your account to another account held within Australia, BPay and PayTo payments.

fees.name: Phone Banking
fees.additionalInfo: A transfer between your BankSA accounts, a transfer from your account to another account held within Australia and BPay payments. Excludes staff assisted transactions.

fees.name: Express Deposit
fees.additionalInfo:
This fee is payable for cash and non-cash deposits made to your account by use of: A tamper evident bag BankSA, St.George or Bank of Melbourne provides and which is deposited in 
an express deposit box located in selected BankSA, St.George or Bank of Melbourne branches; or an express deposit envelope which is deposited in an express deposit box located in selected 
BankSA, St.George or Bank of Melbourne branches.

fees.name: Direct Debit
fees.additionalInfo: A transfer of funds from your account drawn under a direct debit request you gave another person

fees.name: Direct Credit
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is fee is charged for a deposit to your account by direct credit.

fees.name: Cheque
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is charged for each withdrawal relating to a cheque drawn on your account.

fees.name: Staff assisted transactions
fees.additionalInfo: A deposit conducted through BankSA, St.George or Bank of Melbourne staff.

fees.name: Collection Item
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is charged for a cheque or merchant envelope deposit.

fees.name: Bank@Post
fees.additionalInfo: A transaction conducted via Bank@Post. Please note: withdrawals are not available via Bank@Post on this account.

fees.name: Periodical Payment
fees.additionalInfo: A transfer of funds that we make on a regular basis at your request from your account to another specific account.

fees.name: Frequent Statement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is charged for each additional statement provided to you.
